mapper.select: SELECT tbl_report.*, tbl_common.title, tbl_common.post_time, tbl_common.post_content, tbl_common.is_anonymous, tbl_student.nickname, tbl_student.avatarUrl, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tbl_img.img_url SEPARATOR '|') AS img_url FROM tbl_report LEFT JOIN tbl_common ON tbl_common.id = tbl_report.article_id AND tbl_common.post_type = tbl_report.article_type LEFT JOIN tbl_img ON tbl_report.article_id = tbl_img.article_id AND tbl_report.article_type = tbl_img.article_type LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_student ON tbl_common.uid = tbl_student.uid GROUP BY tbl_report.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_report (uid, report_type, report_time, state, article_type, article_id, content) VALUES (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, #{articleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
